root: ^[Larry the Fisherman] Ahoy there, Addison! My my, when was th’ last time I saw ye? Yer looking quite older. Are ye in college?
^[Addison] No. I’m going to graduate high school soon, though.
^[Larry the Fisherman] Shiver me timbers! Such a shame yer mom couldn’t’ve seen ye graduate. It’s such a major accomplishment.
^[Larry the Fisherman] Aye, I remember when my own son graduated from high school. I wept tears o’ joy like there’s no tomorrow!
^[Larry the Fisherman] Anyway, do come by soon! ‘S always a treat when ye visit me by th’ docks.
